alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 09 at 8:36PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Montana, including the following areas, in central Montana, Snowy and Judith Mountains. In north central Montana, Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine and Fergus County below 4500ft. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rain, heavy at times, could result in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains
